responses: Let's check for PCOS. Do you have:
PCOS is a hormonal disorder affecting 1 in 10 women. Key signs: irregular periods, ovarian cysts, insulin resistance. Want to [take a quick assessment](/self_diagnosis)?
Polycystic Ovary Syndrome involves hormone imbalance. Common symptoms: acne, weight gain, fertility challenges.
Let's build your PCOS-friendly meal plan! First, what's your dietary preference?
ü•ó Great choice! Do you follow: Veg/Non-veg/Vegan/Gluten-free?

responses.Vegetarian: Got it! Try these PCOS superfoods: chia seeds, lentils, and Greek yogurt. Want a [7-day veg plan](/nutrition)?
responses.Vegan: Excellent! Focus on plant proteins like tofu and quinoa. Here's a [vegan starter guide](/nutrition)
responses.Non-vegetarian: Great! Fatty fish (salmon) and lean poultry work well. Need [recipe ideas](/nutrition)?
responses.Gluten-free: Smart choice! Try almond flour and buckwheat. Check our [gluten-free recipes](/nutrition)
